backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Stores feature evidence metadata mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short descriptions of key frontend files, including App.tsx, styles, parsing utilities, hooks, and sample templates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color tokens, theming variables, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling party entry, line items, WhatsApp message generation, file import of CSV/XLSX, and UI interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useImportedLists.ts: Manages imported party and item lists with localStorage persistence and helper functions to save and clear data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and client creation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS file defining a purple-tinted color system, dark mode variables, global styles, and typography settings.
frontend/src/lib/importLists/parseImport: Provides client-side CSV/XLSX parsing to extract party and item names, handling headers, sets, and basic validation. Includes CSV line parsing and format error handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended colors, typography, container settings, animations, and custom theme tokens.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s state, features, and requirements for an order app including WhatsApp sharing and CSV/XLSX list imports.
